q: in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. "Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career," Steve Ballmer said in his e-mail. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. Amitabh Srivastava has been with Microsoft since 1997 and played a central role in developing the Windows Azure cloud computing platform that just reached its one-year anniversary Feb. 1. You always have to feel http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_26pts_Melo_38pts_vs_Sonics_KDurant_37pts_07/08_NBA Touted rookies Kevin Durant and Jeff Kollman Green both had career-best efforts for the Seattle SuperSonics and damaged the Denver Nuggets' postseason aspirations. Kevin Durant , the second- overall pick in last year's draft and the leading candidate for rookie of the year, scored a season-high 37 points and Green, the fifth pick, had a season-high 35 to lead the Sonics to a 151-147 double-overtime victory over Denver on Sunday night. "My teammates were making plays and I was just there finishing them, Green said. The loss kept the Nuggets( 46-31) in a tie with Golden State for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference. The Warriors lost to New Orleans, 108-96, earlier Sunday
